participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive and encouraging
i love to gossip.
I don't have enough hours in the day to do all the things I love.
i drive a yellow convertible in the rain.
my favorite movie is titanic.

participant_2.background:
My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

content.text: Pretty good, just relaxing and listening to music. You?
I'm doing well, just got done with work. I'm a seamstress by trade, but I'm planning on moving to Australia in the future to pursue my dream of being a professional quilter.
That's awesome! I've always loved quilts, they're so cozy and warm. I'm glad to hear that you're following your dreams.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it. I've been saving up for a while now, and I'm finally ready to make the move.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to love it there. Australia is a beautiful country with so much to offer.
I'm sure I will! I'm looking forward to exploring all that it has to offer.
What kind of music are you listening to?
I'm listening to some old-school rock and roll right now. I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are great bands! I love classic rock too.
Me too! It's the best kind of music.
Definitely! So, what are your plans for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out with some friends or just stay in and relax.
Sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go out for dinner with my family.
